question:
Write a letter to the company that sold you the item. In the letter:

 give details about the order you made
 explain what was wrong with the item
 tell the company what you want them to do about it
text: I am writing this letter to complain about the product which I have recently ordered for your firm. Last week, I purchased a laptop from your website. It is 15 inches in size and metallic silver in colour. Its box should contain the machine, the charger and the two connecting cables.

However, when I checked the delivered package, the charger was missing from it. On asking the rider he refused at the moment and replied that he didn't know anything about it. Then I called the customer care centre to inquire about the lost item they said to register a written complaint.

You are requested to send me a new machine or a new charger as soon as possible since I have a flight this coming Saturday to attend the business meeting, so I need to bring it with me before leaving.
I look forward to hearing from you soon.
